title: UK 12 Rules Tour: October and November
description:
Tickets (https://bit.ly/2oldTM2): UK 12 Rules Tour: Oct: Manchester (25th), Oxford (26th), Glasgow (27th), Edinburgh (28th); Nov; Cambridge (1st), Edinburgh (7th). 

I will use the lectures to extend and develop key concepts from my books 12 Rules for Life (https://jordanbpeterson.com/12-rules-for-life/) and Maps of Meaning (https://jordanbpeterson.com/maps-of-meaning/)

I am also speaking over the next month in Dublin, Oslo, Amsterdam, Helsinki, Stockholm, Copenhagen and again in Oslo, Stockholm and Helsinki (www.jordanbpeterson.com/events).

--- SUPPORT THIS CHANNEL ---
